document.title: Causes of death
title: Causes of death (3 main causes)
subtitle: (Standardised death rate by 100 000 inhabitants)
instructions0: Select a category to see the comparison between women and men for the EU, the Member States and the EFTA countries.
instructions1_part1: In order to sort by women or by men, rank by clicking on the arrows (
instructions1_part2: ) below the bar chart. To select data for only women or only men, uncheck/check the boxes.
informations: Cancer refer to malign neoplasm. Heart diseases refer to ischaemic heart diseases and include heart attacks. Cerebrovascular diseases include strokes.
dataset-header: Click on link to get to dataset
embed_instruction: Copy this code and paste it in your Website.
